consent.title: Privacy Policy
consent.content_1: To use this service, you must agree to the collection and use of personal information as follows in accordance with Article 15 and Article 17 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
consent.content_2: Matters concerning the collection and use of personal information
consent.content_3: Personal information items collected: Name, email, account ID
consent.content_4: Purpose of using personal information: The collected personal information is used to create and manage accounts for IT services, and is not used for any other purpose.
consent.content_5: Retention and use period of personal information
consent.content_6: We store your personal information as follows and process it in accordance with Article 21 of the Personal Information Protection Act when the purpose of collection, use, and provision is achieved: Retained for up to 1 year after the end of usage period
consent.content_7: You have the right to refuse to consent to the collection of personal information. However, if you do not agree, you cannot use this service.
